content: Story was quite good,the only problem i had was the three page gay fight, completely unnecessary in my opnion

It kinda sucked that the author so obviously wanted you to be with a specific love intrest and the one i did have became a completley different charecter in this story and then dropped off the face of the earth. But the storyline was good, just very biased.
Word of advice: be careful with the swiping function--it led to me making the wrong choice three times
Amazing
What a wild ride ladies and gents! Thank you greatly.

I really love this series but i did have some minor issues. Mainly that if you play as a nonbinary character with they/them pronouns, the grammar does not change to reflect that. It's very, very jarring and I hope it can be fixed somehow.

good writing as in thr fjrst ameplay suffers same problems as the first one - there is an intelligible connection between the choice you are presented and the outcome you want maybe half the time. so playing became a qurstion of brute forcing my way through unclear decisions. rsther than tighten things up the designer or publisher chose to sell you a $1 in-app purchase to serve as an in-game walkthrough for unclear decisions. that takes all the fun out - need better writing around choices.
I'm having issues getting my save data from the previous game.
under paid hero discount lol ðŸ˜‚
I can recommend this series to anybody! I replayed all of the installments and keep coming back over the years!
i love this series so much.
Love this series!
amazing

Zachary Sergi (the author) is a brilliant author in my opinion as he managed to do something few authors manage in these games, he made me genuinely care about the characters, making me hate almost every decision in this one because I really like almost all the characters and as I like to play heroic characters who focus more on helping people then fame (which I like to think is the person I am) I was particularly devastated by betrayals (SPOILER, I TRUSTED YOU WINTRY HOW COULD YOU DO THIS TO ME!), ultimatums and decisions in this story which I am thankful are both meaningful and are resolved in the sequel. As I said in my previous review I highly recommended this story to anyone who is even remotely interested in superheroes, amazing story's with heart wrenching decisions, or any who aren't sure where they stand.
Wonderful! Deep storyline, well-rounded characters, meaningful choices, great replay value. Really draws you in emotionally, so that you become immersed in the story world.
It's a great work
Everyone has so much thought behind their characters it feels so alive

Do you enjoy having political opinions shoved down your throat? If so this 
book is for you. The further you get in the book the more time is spent on 
irrelevant political issues. If this book bothered with tact or open 
metaphors then it's writing would be greatly improved. Being force-fed 
someone else's political opinion leaves a bitter taste.
If you like superheroes, this is a must try.  Also check out community college hero.

Superheroes and reality TV could be a good match, but this one is not it as it's a fairly dumb sequel to a fairly dumb game.  I especially liked the Discourse scene that just ground the plot to a complete halt while the flat characters hash out the author's views on real world issues. (I have no problem with real world issues in games; what matters is how they're handled.)
I hate this nothing at all ever goes your way you have to literally crawl through everything don't buy

The hardest one for me in the trilogy! I had to really think about my choices in this one... some left unpleasant consequences which caused replays but I was happy with my result at the end! For the other two I kind of flossed to and ended with really good results but dang I had to work for this one!   Loved the concept of a show and it was well executed!

Out of all the 3 series, this one is the most intense heart twisting plot in my opinion. I'm forced to make decision I didnt want mainly because I like to befriend everyone and had to compromise with maintaining somewhat good relationship with others and keeping true with my romantic option. Great job for maintaining thrill/drama.
The greatest story arc I've read anywhere
Another amazing game! I can't wait to see what unique animal ideas you come up with for the next games, it's going to be so cool.
I'm not a fan of "reality television" but this scenario was amazing!

The whole concept of mashing a reality TV show with superpowers is kind of brilliant all on its own. Aside from that, I love the relationships, frenemies, sabatoging and otherwise harrowing adventure that your character takes through the process of navigating a highly volatile environment between the stakes, other competitors, and actual threats. Fun stuff!!!

Really took the story to a shite place.  First two were solid stories, then this one it's suddenly American Idol and all about balancing your relationships? Not to mention that you really don't get to carry over any other decisions from the past games.
This is the best choice of game I have ever played! I highly recommend it to those who wants play as a superhero or a villain.

The writer seems to be more focused on pushing some type of LGBT agenda than writing an excellent story. Again foolish Mc, almost no choice matters, I'm not understanding the hype for this series. Save your money and get the Infinity series.
I didn't know what to do with myself after finishing the series. It was honestly that A-freaking-MAZING. Truly one of the best stories I have ever read.
Really loved every party of this series, and I'm kinda sad that I just finished hero fall.  Love your stuff man, keep it up
I got me very attached to the story especially the unexpected twist at the end with prodigal. Worth every penny. Make more series please
I'm about to play HeroFall, and this game was as amazing as "The Prodigy." I've also heard the game "Community College Hero 2" will come out this season! Amazing!
Amazing story way better than the first installment
Great game
Its a great game
Some minor grammar errors but still great! Good stuff!! The writing keeps getting better and better. Definitely getting more games from the same writer
replyContent: Can you send us screenshots of the problems? support@choiceofgames.com

content: If you're on the fence, buy it.
Even though I had to replay prodigy all over again it was worth it
replyContent: Sorry it's not working for you! We'll need more information to fix it. Please email us at support-heroproject-gps@choiceofgames.com and we'll try to make things right!

content: Sad to say I almost didn't buy this because of some other reviewer saying it was too short and linear. That reviewer is an idiot! Buy this game and thank me later. I am extremely impressed with this series so far. I seriously think this interactive novel has a more complex and engaging story than most big budget movies I've seen. As for the length I would say this chapter is roughly 2-3 times longer than the first one. Do yourself a favor and get this as soon as you can. I CAN'T WAIT for the next part!!!!!!
Worth it
I can't wait for the next one to come out.
A great story. Black Magic's ultimatum really frustrated me though. But I feel this is a very good bridge between the first story and the finale. This is a true 2nd act.

I really wanted to like this game more than I did! I enjoyed the ability to import my hero from Heroes Rise: Prodigy using the Choice of Games save-game server. However, I felt that I was at a disadvantage due to choices made in Prodigy which I could never change in this game. I was really, really frustrated by this game when I kept getting thrown out of the competition for what seemed like petty reasons. Early on in the story, getting voted out of the competition ends the game. In the end I opted to spend the Â£0.63 or so to purchase the MeChip warning system, which would give advice about the best choices or tactics. Without that, I would have spent several restarts figuring out the best combination in order to stay in the competition. I couldn't get over the annoyance of every little decision having huge consequences in the competition. Everything I did seemed to upset the judges, and doing one thing would upset a whole bunch of people, no matter which choice I made. It felt, to me, like this game was a struggle, and I can only hope that this was because of the relationships/stats of my imported hero rather than the story itself.
Perfect way to make time speed by.
Great story
The game is amazing!!!!

I wanted more freedom in this. It seemed that I had less control this time and several of the right choices could've only been picked by pure luck. I was very frustrated with situations that went "you choose to do this" immediately followed by "something screws you over anyway".
Amazing second part of this trilogy!
Another winner
I can't seem to save my playthrough to import it into the final game- massively disappointing now that I'm hooked on the trilogy!
Just finished The Hero Project and moving on to the next game. I freaking love these games. Amazing writing and great plot twists that keep me guessing.

It perfectly built on its previous chapter, making for an amazing story of epic proportions. With all the new characters, difficult choices, it's no wonder this is their best story. I definitely recommend this for all comic book fans.
Great use of forcing my hands to make choices between friends, lovers, your own judgement. Gives me enough rage to want to play again for better results.

Still the same problems than the first one.  Some choices are too random because we are given too few informations (that you should have) or because the choice ask you about something in the future (and it ask to stay true to what you said even after new informations) or because the description is too short... It's REALLY FRUSTRATING !  Same problem too with the "you could do a better score !" MAN ! It's a game about choices for making a story, not for scoring !   Bad taste in mouth...
I loved this so much , I just wish there was more

This game is unbelievably good I beat all three of them in a week I seriously could not stop reading this stuff and to the people who made this game I like to give a sincere thank you this is by far one of the most enjoyable games I have played in my life and considering I normally go for graphically flashy games and this game has no graphics to speak of it really says a lot about the quality of the material
A masterpiece, just as its prequel
This is an amazing good with an  engaging story. I highly recommend it.
Just brilliant
If you haven't already, get the first 2. Now. Like, right now. Stop reading this and go get it! What are you waiting for?
Even better than the first book

As my review for the first, i can't speak highly enough for this series, got so invested over the last week of the trilogy to the point I've been at work contemplating decisions i made the night before etc, looking forward to getting back to it after work. Don't hesitate to get this, although be warned your sleep may suffer!
Some decisions didn't really seem to have an impact on the story. But still, amazing, five outta five.
I might have hit the wrong button now I think I messed up my chances in my alliance, it would be cool if you had one re-do, like a go back to the last page once.
Love it just as much as the first

The setting is entirely different from the previous game and it is enjoyable. You can still tell there are a lot of fake choices, but at least the consequences are obvious now. The "combat" is shorter and more predictable this time but still likeable.
I liked this one aswell so 5 stars for me.
warning system in app purchase says the billing method is out of date. really want to buy it and i cant
I really love it, but whenever I try to save my game at the end, it gives me an alert that says it can't upload my save. Please help!!!

Holy Slugger (in game reference). The second installment of the serious is a real kicker in the gonads. At first I thought the storyline would be hard to get into, but it's written so brilliantly that it drew me in even more! With a fantastic structure to the storyline it delivers something uniquely epic, and the ending, well... No spoilers!
That's why they made a series of 3 episodes. The best serie so far. Would like more like this.
Great setting, bridges very well from the previous heroes rise and sets up for the finale really well
Reinstalled and now i have to buy the 99cent thing again, help?
This trilogy was so worth waiting for!  The story was engaging and the romantic element seemed important to the plot without being a mandatory subplot.  Fantastic.
Love these stories/games whatever you want to call them.
Very good

When I saw it was a text-based game,  my mind flashed back to the old "blue screen" games from ages ago. I thought a text game on a smart phone would be like using a lunar lander to go to the mailbox. But having just finished all three of the games in this series, I was astonished how well-written and truly immersive they are. I got done and thought, this would make a great movie trilogy!... Except the middle movie wouldn't suck!
Loved it.

As other people have done, this is a review for the entire series as a whole. The story is fantastic. It is so well-done and I'm really, really going to miss it. I hope that there is more to come, and I highly recommend it.
Such an awesome app/game

The concept is terrible, a tv show about heroes competing to be the best? The execution is about as entertaining. I couldnt finish it. At one point, the game spends an entire 4 or more pagesbof discussion between characters about the image of homosexuality in society and how they should and shouldnt represent themselves. Since every character is gay, you have to listen to them all way in. It feels like the whole segment is trying to make a statement that is really out of place in a video game, and boring.
Really great super hero story.would make a great comic.

I'm rating not only this instalment, but the series as whole. Why? Well, I'm giving them all the same rating; also, the more time you invest in following your hero, the more difficult it becomes to put the story down. Just one more decision, one more chapter, etc. I spent many an hour past my bed time to discover what fate had in store for my dear protagonist. I'd recommend this to anyone who enjoys a great read and doesn't mind staying up late to get swept away by it's story. Well, Hero, will you rise?
The game's great and all but why can't I continue with the save from the previous game?? It's like you put the feature in as a cruel joke or something. Please fix this. Please?
Well worth it if you enjoy choose your own adventure games.  They've fixed the game save issue.  This is the second game in the series.
I liked it a lot. Very challenging. Also appreciate that it is longer than several similar stories. Liked the characters.
Looking forward to the next one.
Well worth the money! Very long and detailed. Thoroughly enjoyed this Super Hero game! Highly recommend the other 2 as well!
A truly amazing sequel!
In depth, refreshing, fantastic
If u like good writing ad a great story buy this app. Easily most addicting amazing app ever please support so they can make more

I find myself spending even MORE countless hours in a row, tinkering with the story and hanging on to the edge of my seat. New friendships, goals, romances.... I also like that my save file from The Prodigy carries over to the next one, and that as readers we are made to weigh tough decisions. Again, I wish the choices weren't so limiting in achieving our desired outcomes. But I hope the creators keep doing wht they're doing.
I can't seem to access the legend guide, but it's really just a minor inconvenience. I still love all of it and really just all your stories in general! Thanks for the good times!!
The choices are not intuitve. There's no way to know the outcome until you pick something making a downward spiral.  Especially if you don't transfer your save file.
Can't wait for the next installment of the series..........P.S. There should be a prequel where you can play as your  characters parents
Not as good as the first but still a great story
Fun

Still the same thing. I feel its to linear and once again the choices you make doesn't seem to do much.  What anoyed me is that the game assumed that i'm with black magic yet at the first game my MC did'nt really had a relationship with her/him.  Hope the last installment can mostly be improved.
Linear, mundane. Especially if you hate reality shows. You can get penalized for heroism that isnt relatable to a reality show audience. Banal.
Worth the money. Can not wait for the next game!
Brilliant
Amazing!
Awesome
When is the next game coming out?
Entertaining and superbly written
Could not stop with this series. So incredibly simple yet captivating, a great way to spend free time.

This game is the best and most in depth choice game I have ever played! If you keep this saga going I will gladly show support! Also I wouldn't mind seeing another choice of dragon in the future even if I have to buy it I will gladly do so. Along with choice of vampire. But this saga is by far my favorite!
But I want you to keep making more so make 2 more then ill give it that last star

Its ridiculous how in depth and lengthy this story is. Not sure how people are saying the choices don't matter... One wrong choice and everything changes, one different person gets voted off. Cannot wait for the next one but until then just gotta keep playing out different scenarios I suppose. Keep up the good work!

Well-worth the price. A good read, although too linear for a 'choose your own adventure' game. Seems like the choices don't matter, you'll get the same ending. Only difference is how you get there. The saving grace is that the story and writing is good. Please consider making a real 'choose your own adventure' story next time..
Can't wait for the sequel.
One of my favorite series from this company. Can't wait for part 3! I've never been huge on super hero stories, but this author as me completely hooked!
Played 1 & 2 they were cool But needed more options like choosing own powers back story etc and no options to move story out a bit more still can't wait til 3 is released
Really fun story and enjoyable enough to play again and again.  Possibly needs a few more different outcomes to make it stand out.
Good story.
Great game much better than the first one but definitely could have made it less liner but otherwise great.
As the other reviewers mentioned, it's a bit linear. With that said, I was completly mesmerized by the detail in this game and the overall plot. Also the promo video was really cool!
I would like a little more freedom, but I am looking forward to part 3 :-)
Choices really dont matter played it out three times disappointed at only one possible outcome. it is how ever well written but falls short as a choice game.

I like the first one better to be honest but this book seems more like a bridge between two books just to hook up the story I hope they can deliver on all the hype. There is actually only been one book they've made I really hate
I am dying to play Heroes Fall
Loved the first, second and looking forward to the third! So detailed and drama filled! Just everything about it and the choices you make makes it seem like you're the hero :)
I'm literally in love with this app x1000 over and I've played it ten times over and counting and when I finish it it makes me realize.........my life is boring compared to this games world
Engaging, creative, really gives you tough choices (whilst not often) by far the best text vase game I've ever experienced. Try it, or you're really not doing yourself any favours

The butthurt comments that you 'can't die' are really an injustice to such a fantastic piece. This game was brilliantly executed, and the writer is extremely talented. The dramatic buildup is masterfully worked into the plot, and the subtle (haha) political undertones were things i personally really agreed with. I was very impressed with this, and I can't recommend it highly enough!
This was the best one yet!! I so mad the way mine ended I can't wait for #3 to come out!
The hero series has turned into one of my favorite series. I don't even care for Super hero stuff but this has a really genuine character. A clever sequel!

Can't wait for the next one when does it come out?!? Team Lucky, Black magic is an a-hole I really need to know his back round, love them both though. The hero needs to be able to stand up for himself more in the dialogue

The only gripe I have to give is that some of the "archtype" personality choices can be hard to tell apart. For example, many of the "villain" and "ruthless strategist" choices can be hard to tell apart, and if you want the best score at the end you can't deviate from your first choice. Other than that, I think the game is an excellent addition to the series, and I can't wait for part 3.
Definitely cannot wait for part 3! I really felt like I was a being in this universe, and through the twist and turns of this story my heart rose and sank.
Love the set up and the end wow.  Just wish if you made a bad choice it has a major effect on you.  Still great choice game.
I love it!!
This second installment of the Heroes Rise series is just as fun and creative as the first; thanks Zach!
This sequel is amazing and totally worth the small price for such an amazing story.
Had me biting my nails the entire time

Like the first game there are a few noticeable fake choices, but it has improved greatly, giving the player a significant role while still weaving the creator's vision for the story. Can't wait for the climatic ending to the trilogy.
I felt like this installment of the Heroes Rise series was severely lacking any sort of character or story development due to what feels like a rushed release.

I have loved this series for the longest time, the well set scenery, the whole cheezy plot scheme, the fun hero characters.  There is a lot to love about this and it was well worth the money. The only negative aspect is the romance scheme and the over all feeling of failure. The romance scheme with Lucky and Black Magic gave you an ultimatium, one or the other. This wasn't something that I liked as I would have loked to keep a good relationship with either regardless of the alliance I joined.  Cantwait4hr3
Absolutely worth the wait such a great plot and the amount of results possible are just amazing
One of the best cyoa books on the play store. I love it and can't wait for the next one so hurry it up guys lol

I've bought both 1 and  2, and both sucked. There's no way - it seems - to die, the choices don't matter and are too few. I think people are writing fake reviews, because it's not at all "breathless" - anyone who has ever read choose your own adventure knows good from not.
This game is long and so many different options. Fell in love when Alter Ego came out and this is even better! Keep it up guys!

You guys are awesome.  Like the Imagination of the Creator (s) is phenomenal.  Never stop guys.  You have my support all the way and I'll be one of the first to purchase the sequel.  Please don't take too long.... but please don't rush the amazing quality of this game.  May appear linear, but it really isn't.  Just have an imagination and you're set.
It's straight up awesome.
Another home run!! Awesome seried and I cant wait for the next one, im so psyched!!!!!
Very satisfying sequel. Looking forward to the next.

The stats are dynamic and extensive, the characters have distinct personalities, the plot is in depth and amazing, the tournament style competition is so exciting, the art is cool and the novel has good length. But the preliminaries seem a little rushed, at least half of the choices are fake,  there are a few grammar/spelling errors, and it's extremely linear.
Really one of the best you guys came out with. Can't wait for the next.
Loved the first one, not quite finished with this one yet, but so far so good!
Awesome.
I loved it, and hope third is just as good as first two.

Not only a fantastic and immersive game, but a true literary masterpiece. GG is seriously such an awesome character and definetely got a few chuckles outta me XD I started at 11am and finished at 5.30pm! And thats only my first play through! Although sometimes i felt my choices didn't affect the gameplay, they still made me think what my character would be thinking which helped with the experience. Long review for a great IF :D (Still need to buy the first and i look forward to the third game!!!)

Its worth it 2nd part. Kong n good plots. Entertaining. 5 stars for great work. Keep it up
Story is good. Nothing really original or new, but enjoyable and with some twists. I would want more freedom. At certain points I really missed some options. Definitely worth the money though.
These guys make the best games on the marketplace.
Its great. Ill be buying the third since i love the first two so much
I was able to feel brayed and loved by the characters written in this interactive novel and I must say that I can't  wait for part 3.
This game was incredible! Definitely worth 2.99

This game or book is one of the best book in the "choice of" novels it's so engaging you will really feel that you are part of the story. The drama, the plot etc. Everything in a comic or novel or any story book for that matter is present here although the cons are although minor are  the character development, the change of scene, the phasing, etc.my suggestions/comment: Please make this title or book or episode run atleast 6 or 7 more, make a happy ending were you and your chosen one will settle in
One of the greatest interactive pieces of fiction I ever stumbled upon, great storyline, characters, twists and writing, can't wait for the next part to come out :)

Unlike other CoG, this one is worth every single penny. The length and amount of details to ensure players are fully immersed and invested in the story is just greatly. Perhaps not as good as the first one (I feel the first one is more human), but it certainly did it's best. Kudos!
Best adventure text game i played in a long time. Nn7.
So cool well written alot of romance good replay quality.
Can't wait for part 3

This one has so many twists and turns and big issues dealt with in this one.  I'm not even that big on superheroes but it's done so well, both gameplay and writing wise, that it doesn't matter. Plus the length is more than enough for anyone, I was playing for around 5/6 hours to get through it all!  Truely a 5 star game, well worth the purchase.
Won't let me make other options really upsetting. Fix soon

This game is an amazing feat of both story-telling and entertainment. This is exactly what interactive fiction games should be. Right up there with the original Choice of Vampire and Smackdown as masterpieces. Congratulations and thank you.
Great game but I can't load a game from prodigy to continue on this one
Awesome!!! , Dont make me wait for next sequel...slugger..
I was starting to get bored of choice of games because of how linear the stories have been but this one made me remember why these are the only apps on the play store I keep track of and buy
Dont play this unless you played the first. Its freaking awesomely addictive. Im looking forward to playing it all agian when im done
The plot, the drama and twists, the choices, the characters, the love triangle  ...I love it all! Definitely worth the five stars and the money! Can't wait for the third installment!
a great sequel and a lot of interesting choices
That's all I can say...amazing. can't wait for the next one

Story and choices were great. Many decisions will change your relationships with other characters. The rounds of elimination give more consequence to your choices.  Loved it. Cleared it a half dozen times and there are still different ways to play through.
Epic! Can't wait for part 3!
This is great! Im not a reading kind of guy but this blows my mind i highly recommend you play the firt one!
Should have more real choices. The hero and etc choices should be marked. Background should have choices so you can pick who you saved. Overall good.
Great game can't wait for the next one.
Then the first one! Pretty amazing stuff. It had me up until 5am after I bought it and until 1am the next day(only went to bed because of work)! I really look forward to the 3rd one!
You can win, you can lose. The length of the game is astounding, and there is a lot of replay value. Hope the third chapter takes less time!

I've been waiting for months for this to come out and I haven't been let down in my wait. This was beyond a shadow of a doubt worth the buy. The story line is well constructed, even though I know it's just a story I got invested in it and I love that it did that it makes it so real! I hope I don't have to wait long for the next part but I'm willing to wait years and I know you won't let me down. Spectacular work,  absolutely spectacular.
A brilliant sequel that left me breathless by the end. A shining example of what interactive fiction can be and a must-buy for anyone who loves superheroes. I can't say enough good about it!
This is by far the best Choice game IMHO. While its not the most open ended game, the choices you make are definitely great and the storytelling is top notch. Can't wait for part 3!!!
Long and entertaining story. Worth its money. Looking forward for part 3.
I'm quite happy with the latest installment and just loved all that you can do. It was a great follow up in the series.
Long, quite complex and very rewarding. A very good sequel, managing to widen the scope whole becoming more personal at the same time. The best CoG title yet!
Fun game with a great story and cant wait for part three which I hope will be released very soon!.

I was in the epilogue and it wouldn't allow me to make a choice, so I pressed back and it sent me straight to the beginning. Which means I'll have to play all the way through again to see the epilogue... The content is fantastic though.
Awesome awesome awesome can't wait till part 3
Great continuation of the story. Loved every minute of the story. Ending blew my mind.
omg, what?!!!! You can't do this to me. Awesome job on the Hero Project. Now I have to wait for part 3. Overall you didn't disappoint Zachary and CoG.
As expected, a fantastic interactive story that has garnered my first text review and a well deserved 5 stars.
